oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Pvt. Ruby Glenn Blevins with Remington Model 1917 rifle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Ruby Glenn Blevins was from Blount County and served in Co. L, 117th Inf. Regt. in France and Belgium. He posed with a Remington Model 1917 rifle. Blevins was wounded slightly in action on September 24, 1918, and survived the war. The family reports that he refused promotion and died in 1971.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blevins, Ruby Glenn
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
